history.content:
Web Development at Berkeley is recruiting!

We are UC Berkeley's first web development and design-centered organization, bringing full-stack web development and design education and hands-on industry development and design experience to our members.

We also run a DeCal, Introduction to Full Stack Development, for those of you who are looking to get a start in your web development journeys in a fun, safe, and inviting environment. Our course is open to all experience levels!

Whether you are interested in joining the club or taking the DeCal, we will have two info-sessions for each and an initial written application that you must fill out. Applications are open NOW at https://webatberkeley.org/join for the club and https://fullstackdecal.com/ for the DeCal!

If you are interested in the club:

  • Attend our info-sessions to learn more about what we do as a club!
    • Info-session 1 @ Moffit 101 on 8/31 (Tuesday) 8-10 PM PST
    • Info-session 2 @ Jacobs 310 on 9/2 (Thursday) 7-8 PM PST
    • Our application is open NOW at https://webatberkeley.org/join Due date: 9/5 (Sunday) by 11:59 PM PST!

If you are interested in the DeCal:

  • Attend our info-sessions to learn even more and have the chance to talk to the course staff!
    • Info-session 1 @ Moffit 101 on 8/30 (Monday) 8-10 PM PST
    • Info-session 2 @ Zoom on 9/1 (Wednesday) 7-9 PM PST Zoom link: https://tinyurl.com/wdb-zoom
    • Our application is open NOW at https://fullstackdecal.com/ Due date: 9/7 (Tuesday) by 11:59 PM PST!

We look forward to seeing what you all have to offer and are excited to read through your applications. Good luck and go bears!

In the meantime, follow us on our socials:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/webatberkeley

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/webatberkeley

Website: https://www.webatberkeley.org

Email: webatberkeley@gmail.com
